The 'Jsonifier' class centralizes JSON serialization/deserialization, allowing injection of custom JSON libraries and additional args. The 'loads' method decodes bytes, then attempts to parse JSON, returning raw data if parsing fails, which is safe. No dangerous code injection, backdoors, or malicious logic found. Usage appears standard and aligned with JSON handling best practices.",
